replies.author: Melodyvoices
replies.txt_content:
Melodyvoices 发表于 2016-2-19 12:08
输入/mangaddp default -essentials. 权限名 去除某某权限
应该是/mangaddp default 权限名 去除某权限，essentials是ESS插件的权限前缀
